message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to offer it to you for $20,000.  What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but the product is worth significantly more than that to me. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I am still not able to meet at $16,000. I am willing to pay up to $14,000 for the product. I hope this offers a compromise.
